meta.title: An Overview of Mountain God Altars (labtsé)

nodes.body:
This can also be spelled in Tibetan lab rtse  (ལ་ཙེ།) or la tse (ལབ་རྩེ།).

ལ་ཙེ
[Tuesday6/5/12 11:05:58 PM] Dudul Dorjay: ལབ་རྩེThe spelling can also vary, including ལ་ཙེ and ལབ་རྩེ།.
nodes.title: An Overview of Mountain God Altars (labtsé)
